channel.title: zig on gingerBill
channel.description: Recent content in zig on gingerBill

item.title: A Reply to _The Road to Zig 1.0_
item.description: It is lovely to see many new programming languages being produced to solve different issues that the designers are trying to address. Many of the new big ones include Rust, Go, and Swift, all of which are trying to solve different problems. There are some not-as-big programming languages that I recommend everyone to checkout: Odin1 Scopes Zig They are all very good languages but with entirely different philosophies behind them.
